diff_analysis.evidence: In SampleAjaxPlugin.execute, the new code builds a JavaScript snippet using String.format and directly concatenates the unvalidated 'params' plugin parameter into a JS string literal and POST body ("...').post('params=%s&X-XSRF-TOKEN='+token)"). Because params comes from wiki/plugin input and is not escaped for JavaScript or HTML context, an attacker can inject arbitrary JavaScript, leading to reflected/stored XSS (CWE-79).
